title: A Harsh World Full of Uncertainty

text_block_list.text:
One day, while I was working… Nakayama Festa's 
homeroom teacher came to the trainer's office.

text_block_list.name: Homeroom Teacher
text_block_list.text:
I see… Nakayama isn't here either. Sorry for bothering 
you while you were in the middle of something.

text_block_list.name: Homeroom Teacher
text_block_list.text:
Haaah, I'm in trouble… I need to get her completed 
assignment by the end of the week so I can grade it…

text_block_list.name: Nakayama's Classmate A
text_block_list.text: Where's Nakayama? Who knows. I've never talked to her.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama's Classmate B
text_block_list.text:
Nakayama's always seemed a bit unapproachable. 
Y'know, I heard that he was arrested the other day.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama's Classmate B
text_block_list.text:
Oh, yeah… while a friend of mine was on a run, she saw 
Nakayama arguing with an officer…

text_block_list.name: Rough-looking Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Huh? How should I know? I got no clue where she is. 
Seriously, it's all just Nakayama this, Nakayama that.
choice_data_list: Eh? Who else besides me is…?
Eh? Who else besides me is…?

text_block_list.name: Rough-looking Boy
text_block_list.text:
The other day, some other guys came by looking for her. 
You were one of the ones Nakayama made a fool of, weren't you?

text_block_list.name: Rough-looking Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Hm? I assumed you were involved in that mess. 
Y'see, apparently…

text_block_list.name: Rough-looking Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Nakayama cheated during a poker game and won big. 
Now, she's being chased down by the people she cheated.

text_block_list.name: Rough-looking Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
They're looking all over the place looking for her. 
Aaah, I wonder how she'll end up.

After that, I followed rumors to various different places, 
but Nakayama Festa's whereabouts remained unknown.

What I got instead was plenty of unsavory gossip 
about things Nakayama Festa would never do.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: Hmm…? Oh, trainer? You look blue in the face.

I told Nakayama Festa the whole story. How I'd started looking 
for her due to the assignment, but then ——

I'd learned rumors about her from both in out of school, 
from cheating in games to getting in trouble with the police.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
Hahaha… I didn't even know there were such 
interesting stories being thrown around.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
They're nonsense. Cheating to win big? Hah, that's bullshit. 
I wonder if it would even light up anything in me.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
…The people who are spreading that sort of crap are 
the same ones who've lost some kind of competition 
to me. That's how much they resent and envy me.

Indeed, she seems to have many enemies in 
the world of competition. But this is no 
time to be intimidated. As her trainer ——
choice_data_list: If anything happens, I'll protect you.
If anything happens, I'll protect you.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
Eh…? You're brash, aren't you? 
You might get in trouble too, you know?
choice_data_list: <size=38>No matter what anyone says, I'll stand by you.</size>
<size=38>No matter what anyone says, I'll stand by you.</size>

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
No matter what anyone thinks, eh? 
Keheh… easier said than done.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: Don't get so smug. You are my trainer.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
For me, racing is why I live. I won't make the mistake of 
screwing up that opportunity.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: That's all you need to know as my trainer, yeah?

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: Well then, both of us should just take it easy.

I will never change my mind about Nakayama Festa. 
However, I still felt as if I needed to learn more about her.
